DataElement.preferredName: Head and Neck Pharynx Residue Present Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the type of pharyngeal residue based on the modified barium swallow assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Head and Neck Pharynx Residue Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the bolus remaining on or within the pharynx.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: For oncology, area of the body generally construed to comprise base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

Concepts.definition: For oncology, an area of the body generally construed to comprise the base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

Property.preferredDefinition: (FAIR-inks) The hollow tube about 5 inches long that starts behind the nose and ends at the top of the trachea (windpipe) and esophagus (the tube that goes to the stomach).:A single unit within a polymer; a recognizable molecular fragment embedded in a larger molecule.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A hollow tube that starts posterior to the mouth and nasal cavity and ends superior to the trachea and esophagus.
A single unit within a polymer; a recognizable molecular fragment embedded in a larger molecule.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the type of residue remaining on or within the pharynx related to the modified barium swallow assessment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: A single unit within a polymer; a recognizable molecular fragment embedded in a larger molecule.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
A single unit within a polymer; a recognizable molecular fragment embedded in a larger molecule.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Less Than Fifty Percent Unit Pharyngeal Residue

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Less Than Fifty Percent Unit Pharyngeal Residue
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).: Substance remaining in the pharynx after swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).
Substance remaining in the pharynx after swallowing.

PermissibleValues.value: Greater than or equal to 50% pharyngeal residue
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Greater Than or Equal To Fifty Percent Unit Pharyngeal Residue

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Fifty Percent Unit Pharyngeal Residue
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.: A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).: Substance remaining in the pharynx after swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).
Substance remaining in the pharynx after swallowing.
